mapper.select: SELECT c.message_id, c.chat_room_id, c.chat_sender, c.chat_receiver, c.chat_message, c.chat_created_at, CASE WHEN c.chat_sender = #{loginUserId} THEN 'ME' WHEN c.chat_sender = r.user_id THEN 'SELLER' ELSE 'BUYER' END AS senderRole FROM chat c JOIN room r ON c.chat_room_id = r.room_id WHERE c.chat_room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY c.chat_created_at ASC
